Event_Information.name: Game Jam 2025
Event_Information.description: The Game Jam is a week long beginner-friendly competition between developers on creating a game. It is open to all CSI and Brooklyn College students and majors.

Judging_Criteria.description: The game prompts players to interact with it and provides rules and features that allow them to understand the game goals.
The game should include novel or unique aspects, either through a truly new concept or a novel application of an existing concept or concepts.
The game should clearly demonstrate through concept, gameplay, story, or characters, the prompt/concept.
While not all future development must be shown during the jam, plans for future expansion of the game or multiple varied gameplay features should be presented.
The team presents their proposed game clearly to the audience through a 5-minute video presentation.

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: What is Game Jam 2025?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: The Game Jam is a week long beginner-friendly competition between developers on creating a game.

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: Who can participate in Game Jam 2025?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: The Game Jam 2025 is open to all CSI and Brooklyn College students and majors.

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: When is Game Jam 2025?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: Game Jam 2025 is from January 16th @ 2:00pm to January 24th @ 5:00pm.

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: What is the discord server for Game Jam 2025?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: You can join the discord here: https://discord.com/invite/q4Yyx3dhJC

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: Will be there food at Game Jam 2025?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: Yes, there will be food at Game Jam 2025.

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: Do I need to have experience to participate in Game Jam 2025?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: No, you do not need to have experience to participate in Game Jam 2025. The competition is beginner-friendly.

Frequently_Asked_Questions.question: What is the team limit for Game Jam 2025? Can I participate alone?
Frequently_Asked_Questions.answer: The team limit for Game Jam 2025 is 4. You can participate alone or with a team.
